Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Hunan Yingtian Agricultural Development Co., Ltd. is a modernized agricultural enterprise focusing on grain acquisition, sales and processing.With advanced rice processing production lines and modernized storage facilities, the company is committed to providing consumers with high-quality, safe and healthy grain products.

The company's business covers a wide range of fields such as grain acquisition, sales, rice processing, noodle product production, agricultural product development, etc. It also provides services such as warehouse leasing, cargo storage, commodity distribution, etc., forming a complete industrial chain.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Some video data from the company's inception
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: Use the go-car tool to package the video data as a car file and send it to the storage provider with boost
